42.eng-name: Model Behavior of the Prophet (Kitab Al-Sunnah)

hadiths.text: Narrated AbuUmamah: The Prophet (ﷺ) said: If anyone loves for Allah's sake, hates for Allah's sake, gives for Allah's sake and withholds for Allah's sake, he will have perfect faith

chapter.ara-name: باب الدَّلِيلِ عَلَى زِيَادَةِ الإِيمَانِ وَنُقْصَانِهِ
chapter.eng-name: Proof Of Increase And Decrease Of Faith
